hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn Abi Laila, from one of the Companions of the Prophet [SAW], that:The Prophet [SAW] forbade (mixtures of) Al-Balh and dried dates, and of raisins and dried dates

chapter.ara-name: باب نَهْىِ الْبَيَانِ عَنْ شُرْبِ، نَبِيذِ الْخَلِيطَيْنِ الرَّاجِعَةِ إِلَى بَيَانِ الْبَلَحِ وَالتَّمْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Clear Prohibition of Drinking Nabidh Made of Two Things Mixed Together, Relies Upon the C
